label: C0
headline: City reports decrease in traffic deaths to 17 in first year of Vision Zero safety program.

label: C21
headline: Council approves agreement with state transportation department to share road and bridge maintenance services at no cost to the city.

label: C17
headline: Council approves $5.4 million increase for Liberty Avenue highway safety project costs.

label: C1
headline: Council calls on Governor to provide state resources to help clean up Pittsburgh's trash and litter problem.

label: C14
headline: Council approves $1.1 million increase for Liberty Avenue project using additional federal highway funding.

label: C7
headline: City Council refers resolution to transfer 14 properties in 12th Ward to Larimer Consensus Group to settle court cases.

label: C16
headline: Council approves amended resolution to accept reduced $250,000 state grant for Smallman Street Complete Street Project.

label: C31
headline: Council approves repealing 2019 resolution that gave redevelopment authority rights to 15th Ward property.

label: C2
headline: Council refers resolution to accept $37,000 grant for investigating old sexual assault cases to committee.

label: C25
headline: Council delays decision on agreement allowing community college students to train with city emergency medical services.

label: C19
headline: Council approves $93,000 increase for Office of Community Health and Safety vehicles and equipment purchase.

label: C18
headline: Council approves additional $317,588 for South Negley Avenue Bridge Project, bringing total contract to $1.2 million.

label: C6
headline: City Council considers allowing ALCOSAN to build underground tunnels through nine city properties for $8,200.

label: C20
headline: Council approves $382,513 increase for Haverhill Project bringing total city reimbursement to Pittsburgh Water to $992,629.

label: C11
headline: Council receives Mayor Gainey's annual Vision Zero traffic safety report.

label: C32
headline: Council approves sale of two Hill District lots from redevelopment authority to Pittsburgh Land Bank for $16,290.

label: C5
headline: Council refers resolution to approve sewage plan for South Side townhome development to committee.

label: C8
headline: Council authorizes city officials to apply for $250,000 state grant to help fund Emerald View Trail repairs.

label: C3
headline: Council refers resolution allowing Duquesne Light and Pittsburgh Water to install utility poles and wires on city property at no cost to committee.

label: C9
headline: Council refers resolution for University of Pittsburgh to provide free supplemental waste services in Oakland neighborhood.

label: C28
headline: Council approves easement agreements allowing Duquesne Light and Pittsburgh Water to install utility poles and maintain landscaping on city property at no cost.

label: C26
headline: Council approves reduced Penn Avenue lighting grant for East Liberty business district enhancement project.

label: C4
headline: Council approves sewage plan revision for new apartment development at 296 McKee Place at no cost to the city.

label: C34
headline: Council approves sale of North Aiken Avenue property from redevelopment authority to Pittsburgh Land Bank for $48,500.

label: C12
headline: City Council approves $316,367 settlement for Finland Street Pedestrian Bridge lawsuit.

label: C30
headline: Council approves $72,500 payment to state utility commission for overdue 811 damage prevention call fees.

label: C27
headline: Council approves additional $115,170 for Fort Pitt Park design services, bringing total cost to $415,170.

label: C13
headline: Council approves three-year agreement with USI Insurance Services for city insurance brokerage services.

label: C24
headline: Council holds resolution to transfer $33,292 from salaries to employee benefits for tuition reimbursement.

label: C22
headline: Council holds resolution to cancel $40,000 property sale on Bodkin Street for one week.

label: C15
headline: Council approves $32,750 contract for video production company to create police recruitment videos.

label: C33
headline: Council approves sale of city land on Island Avenue to Island Avenue Holdings for $3,600.

label: C29
headline: Council approves $52,962 payment for one-year Pennsylvania Municipal League subscription.

label: C23
headline: Council holds resolution to sell city-owned property on Itin Street for $3,755.

label: C10
headline: City Council receives weekly grants office status update for April 4, 2025.
